snippet.title: Baldur's Gate 3: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
It’s party time!

Baldur’s Gate 3 is out now on PC. 6 years in the making, we sincerely hope you enjoy the adventure!

Steam: https://larian.club/y_BG3onSteam
GOG: https://larian.club/y_BG3onGOG

Baldur’s Gate 3 launches on PS5 September 6th. Preordering the Deluxe Edition on PS5 will give you access to 72hrs Early Access and many other goodies.

Pre-order the Deluxe Edition: https://larian.club/ya_GetBG3Now

Follow us on social media:
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/larianstudios
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/baldursgate3
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LarianStudios/
• Facebook: https://facebook.com/baldursgate3
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/larianstudios/
• TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@larianstudios
